   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   a   -   p   a   g   e   "   &gt;   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   a   -   s   t   a   t   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   s   t   a   t   e   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   k   e   y   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   a   -   w   l   a   b   -   s   t   a   t   e   s   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   }   "   &gt;   {   "   A   U   I   _   4   9   6   9   7   "   :   "   C   "   ,   "   A   U   I   _   5   1   7   4   4   "   :   "   C   "   ,   "   A   U   I   _   A   T   T   R   _   V   A   L   I   D   A   T   I   O   N   S   _   1   _   5   1   3   7   1   "   :   "   C   "   ,   "   A   U   I   _   B   O   L   T   _   4   6   6   3   2   "   :   "   C   "   ,   "   A   U   I   _   B   O   L   T   _   4   8   8   9   1   "   :   "   T   1   "   ,   "   A   U   I   _   U   X   _   4   7   5   2   4   "   :   "   C   "   ,   "   A   U   I   _   U   X   _   4   9   5   9   4   "   :   "   C   "   }   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

      w   i   d   t   h   :       4   0   0   p   x   ;       h   e   i   g   h   t   :       3   9   p   x   ;       o   v   e   r   f   l   o   w   :       h   i   d   d   e   n   ;   "   &gt;   i   m   g       a   l   t   =   '   B   e   a   u   t   i   f   u   l       t   h   i   n   g   s   ,       u   p   d   a   t   e   d       d   a   i   l   y   '       s   r   c   =   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   g   -   e   c   x   .   i   m   a   g   e   s   -   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   G   /   0   1   /   x   -   l   o   c   a   l   e   /   c   o   m   m   o   n   /   t   r   a   n   s   p   a   r   e   n   t   -   p   i   x   e   l   .   _   V   3   8   6   9   4   2   4   6   4   _   .   g   i   f   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   4   0   0   p   x   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   3   9   p   x   '       u   s   e   m   a   p   =   '   #   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   '       /   &gt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   d   i   v       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       n   o   n   e   ;   "   &gt;   m   a   p       i   d   =   "   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   "   &gt;   a   r   e   a       s   h   a   p   e   =   "   r   e   c   t   "       c   o   o   r   d   s   =   "   1   ,   2   ,   4   0   0   ,   3   9   "       h   r   e   f       =   "   /   s   t   r   e   a   m   /   r   e   f   =   n   a   v   _   s   w   m   _   a   r   r   o   w   ?   p   f   _   r   d   _   p   =   2   1   2   8   4   8   5   6   8   2   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   s   =   n   a   v   -   s   i   t   e   w   i   d   e   -   m   s   g   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   t   =   4   2   0   1   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   i   =   n   a   v   b   a   r   -   4   2   0   1   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   m   =   A   T   V   P   D   K   I   K   X   0   D   E   R   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   r   =   0   0   F   V   Q   2   T   E   Q   0   4   7   F   G   Q   A   1   W   B   W   "       a   l   t       =   "   B   e   a   u   t   i   f   u   l       t   h   i   n   g   s   ,       u   p   d   a   t   e   d       d   a   i   l   y   "       /   &gt;   K   i   t   c   h   e   n       &amp;    D   i   n   i   n   g   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   a   &gt;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   b   e   s   t   s   e   l   l   e   r   s   /   k   i   t   c   h   e   n   /   r   e   f   =   s   v   _   k   d   _   0   /   1   8   1   -   3   0   0   7   0   0   0   -   2   6   1   2   8   6   8   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a   "   &gt;    d   i   v       i   d   =   "   w   a   y   f   i   n   d   i   n   g   -   b   r   e   a   d   c   r   u   m   b   s   _   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   _   d   i   v   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   u   b   h   e   a   d   e   r       a   -   b   r   e   a   d   c   r   u   m   b       f   e   a   t   u   r   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   -   n   a   m   e   =   "   w   a   y   f   i   n   d   i   n   g   -   b   r   e   a   d   c   r   u   m   b   s   "   &gt;   
                   u   l       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   h   o   r   i   z   o   n   t   a   l       a   -   s   i   z   e   -   s   m   a   l   l   "   &gt;

                                                   a       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   t   e   r   t   i   a   r   y   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   h   o   m   e   -   g   a   r   d   e   n   -   k   i   t   c   h   e   n   -   f   u   r   n   i   t   u   r   e   -   b   e   d   d   i   n   g   /   b   /   r   e   f   =   d   p   _   b   c   _   1   /   1   8   1   -   3   0   0   7   0   0   0   -   2   6   1   2   8   6   8   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;n   o   d   e   =   1   0   5   5   3   9   8   "   &gt;

                                       l   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   r   e   a   d   c   r   u   m   b   -   d   i   v   i   d   e   r   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   s   t   -   i   t   e   m       a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   t   e   r   t   i   a   r   y   "   &gt;

                                       /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   l   i   &gt;

                                                   a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   5   7   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   P   i   n       i   t       o   n       P   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   5   Z   v   P   v   b   0   F   Q   T   Q   4   F   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   p   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   p   i   n   %   2   F   c   r   e   a   t   e   %   2   F   b   u   t   t   o   n   %   3   F   u   r   l   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   d   p   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   1   6   A   6   8   0   E   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   5   Z   v   P   v   b   0   F   Q   T   Q   4   F   %   2   6   t   i   t   l   e   %   3   D   T   h   e   %   2   5   2   0   P   a   m   p   e   r   e   d   %   2   5   2   0   C   h   e   f   %   2   5   2   0   C   u   t   %   2   5   2   0   N   %   2   5   2   0   S   e   a   l   %   2   5   2   C   %   2   5   2   0   M   e   d   i   u   m   %   2   5   2   C   %   2   5   2   0   3   -    d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   s   t   a   c   k   "   &gt;   
                   s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   s   m   a   l   l       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   p   r   i   m   a   r   y       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   c   o   n   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   c   a   r   t   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   i   n   p   u   t       i   d   =   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       C   a   r   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   h   o   v   e   r   =   "   S   e   l   e   c   t       &amp;l   t   ;                                                    v   a   r       b   u   y   N   o   w   I   n   f   o       =       A   .   s   t   a   t   e   (   '   b   u   y   N   o   w   I   n   f   o   '   )   ;

                           i   f   (   t   w   i   s   t   e   r   I   n   g   r   e   s   s   D   i   v   )       {   
                                   f   o   r   (   v   a   r       i   =   0   ;       i       i   n   g   r   e   s   s   L   e   n   ;       i   +   +   )       {   
                                           v   a   r       i   n   g   r   e   s   s   E   l   e   m       =       t   w   i   s   t   e   r   I   n   g   r   e   s   s   D   i   v   [   i   ]   ;   
                                           i   n   g   r   e   s   s   E   l   e   m   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   m   i   n   H   e   i   g   h   t       =       m   a   x   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   H   e   i   g   h   t       +       "   p   x   "   ;

                                   }   
                           }   
                   }       e   l   s   e       {

                                   i   f       (   n   T   r   i   e   s           M   A   X   _   T   R   I   E   S   )       {

                                           s   e   t   T   i   m   e   o   u   t   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   )       {   
                                                   s   e   t   I   f   r   a   m   e   H   e   i   g   h   t   (   i   f   r   m   I   d   )   ;   
                                           }   ,       5   0   )   ;       
                                   }   
                           }   
                   }   
           }   
           o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   l   o   a   d       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   )       {   
                   v   a   r       i   f   r   a   m   e       =       d   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   B   y   I   d   (   o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   )   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   d   i   s   p   l   a   y       =       '   '   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   h   e   i   g   h   t       =       "   1   p   x   "   ;   
                   s   e   t   T   i   m   e   o   u   t   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   )       {   
                           i   f   (   o   b   j   .   n   e   e   d   W   i   d   t   h   A   d   j   u   s   t   )       {   
                                   s   e   t   I   f   r   a   m   e   W   i   d   t   h   (   o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   )   ;   
                           }   
                           s   e   t   I   f   r   a   m   e   H   e   i   g   h   t   (   o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   )   ;   
                           v   a   r       o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k       =       o   b   j   .   o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k   ;   
                           i   f   (   t   y   p   e   o   f       o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k       =   =   =       "   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   "   )       {   
                                   o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k   (   )   ;   
                           }   
                   }   ,       5   0   )   ;       
   
           }   
           o   b   j   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   I   f   r   a   m   e       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (       i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   ,       o   n   l   o   a   d   F   n       )       {   
                   v   a   r       i   f   r   a   m   e       =       d   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   (   '   i   f   r   a   m   e   '   )   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   i   d       =       i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   ;

                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   w   i   d   t   h       =       "   1   0   0   %   "   ;

  G   e   t       t   o       K   n   o   w       U   s   /   d   i   v   &gt;   u   l   &gt;   l   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   _   f   i   r   s   t   "   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   f   o   o   t   e   r   _   c   a   r   e   e   r   s   /   1   8   1   -   3   0   0   7   0   0   0   -   2   6   1   2   8   6   8   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   j   o   b   s   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   %   3   F   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   %   3   D   %   2   5   2   F   &amp;s   o   u   r   c   e   =   s   t   a   n   d   a   r   d   s   &amp;t   o   k   e   n   =   2   5   1   1   7   E   9   F   0   1   C   8   F   0   A   B   1   D   6   4   9   F   3   7   E   D   D   D   2   D   E   B   E   0   4   7   C   3   A   6   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   _   a   "   &gt;
